description: black and white view of house at L behind two tall trees; water in foreground; trees along horizon in distance; cloudy sky; mount loose (unattached); in plastic slip cover
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

See signed
signed: on mount front, under where LL edge of sheet was when attached, in pencil: [THE DARKNESS DEEPENS. (underscored); on mount verso, in black ink: [\"The Darkness deepens\" (underscored)/ by/ John M. Whitehead,/ ALVA (underscored)/ Scotland. (underscored)]; in pencil: [#819]; in blue; [5th Annual/ -5 1/2-]
title: The Darkness Deepens
